label: Next Gen ELA standards begin rollout
detail: New York adopted Next Generation ELA Learning Standards, phasing in across grade bands.

label: Next Gen Math standards begin rollout
detail: New York adopted Next Generation Mathematics Learning Standards alongside ELA.

label: COVID-19: 2020 assessments cancelled
detail: NYS cancelled Grades 3-8 assessments and Regents exams for the 2019-20 school year due to COVID-19 pandemic closures.

label: Regents exam waivers extended
detail: NYS extended Regents exam exemptions for eligible students through January 2022.

label: NYS property tax cap enacted
detail: Chapter 97 of the Laws of 2011 established a property tax levy limit (tax cap) for school districts, generally capping increases at 2% or CPI, whichever is less.
